summary.span: Fournit des types qui prennent en charge la sérialisation de documents XPS.

span.span: Provides types that support serialization of XPS documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Pour plus d’informations sur [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)], consultez la spécification XPS (XML Paper) disponible pour téléchargement à l’adresse [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)], see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

related.span: Infrastructure de signature numérique des Open Packaging Conventions

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions
